title: shrI kAncInAyikE
sahitya:
shrI kAncInAyikE shrtajana phaladAyikE


anupallavi

  lOkEshvari pAlini tripurasundari mAlini EkAmranAtha taruNi manjubhASiNi


caraNam    shivakAmEshvarOtsanga madhya nilayE shivE tApasa vara nArada munigE 
nava pallava kOmaLE prasAdam kuru shyAmaLE naga sArvabhauma bAlE nayana vishAlE
